remarks: Value of an operation given by a maps-to rule.  Special case. (Contributed by NM, 16-May-1995.)  (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)
statement:
ovmpt2g.1 $e |- ( x = A -> R = G ) $.
ovmpt2g.2 $e |- ( y = B -> G = S ) $.
ovmpt2g.3 $e |- F = ( x e. C , y e. D |-> R ) $.
ovmpt2.4 $e |- S e. _V $.
ovmpt2 $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) -> ( A F B ) = S ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d S x y $.
